summary: FRACTURES WERE FOUND IN I-BEAMS, AFTER ANOTHER IDENTICAL VEHICLE MANUFACTURED ASCENDING VIN 51166, METAL FATIGUED I-BEAMS FAILED CAUSING AXLE TO BREAK FROM FRAME. THIS OCCURRED ON AUGUST 27,2000, VEHICLE WAS TAKEN TO DEALER ON 27 AUGUST. MANUFACTURE FAXED TO DEALER ON 28 AUGUST, 2000, A SERVICE ADVISORY DATED 09-29-99, DETAILING HOW TO PATCH DAMAGE. BOTH VEHICLES WERE ORDERED SIMULTANEOUSLY AND DELIVERED 04-30-99. SINCE TAKING DELIVERY HAVE RECEIVED NO NOTICE OF POTENTIAL PROBLEM, UNTIL THE FAILURE OF THE OTHER UNIT. INSPECTION OF MY UNIT SHOWED CRACKS IN I-BEAM IN IDENTICAL LOCATIONS AS THE DAMAGED UNIT. I HAVE MADE PHOTOS OF FAILED/DAMAGED UNIT AS WELL AS MY UNIT IN PRESENT CONDITION. ALSO HAVE COPY OF SERVICE ADVISORY FROM MANUFACTURE THAT WAS FAXED TO DEALER ON 08-28-00.  HAVE DISCOVERED THAT MANUFACTURE HAS SINCE CHANGED THE I-BEAM FROM AND 8 INCH TO 10 I-BEAM ON LATER MODELS.  I HAVE E-MAILED COMPLAINT TO MANUFACTURE ON 28 AUGUST 00, DETAILING PROBLEM DISCOVERED. AS OF DATE HAVE RECEIVED NO REPLY , EITHER E-MAIL, LETTER OR PHONE CALL FROM MANUFACTURE.
